sourcesContent:
import { useContext } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { Context } from '../../context' import { database } from '../../firebase/firebaseConfig' import Input from '../../Components/UI/Input/Input' import MainBtn from '../../Components/UI/MainBtn/MainBtn' import './profile.scss' const Profile = ({ darkMode }) => { const { userInfo, setUserInfo } = useContext(Context) const navigate = useNavigate() const chooseFile = e => { const reader = new FileReader() const file = e.target.files[0] reader.onload = () => setUserInfo({ ...userInfo, photo: reader.result }) reader.readAsDataURL(file) } const sendUserInfo = () => { database.writeUserInfoData(userInfo) navigate('/') } const styleObj = { avatarInput: { width: 0, height: 0, fontSize: 0, }, btnStyles: { marginTop: '20px', padding: '10px 25px', borderRadius: '8px', backgroundColor: '#29a19c', fontSize: '18px', color: '#fafafa', }, } return (
setUserInfo({ ...userInfo, nick: e.target.value })} />
setUserInfo({ ...userInfo, email: e.target.value })} readOnly />
save changes
) } export default Profile
